de.targodan.usb.io.processing

Class HexchatMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.targodan.usb.io.processing.AbstractMarshaller
      • de.targodan.usb.io.processing.HexchatMarshaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Marshaller

    public class HexchatMarshaller
extends AbstractMarshaller
    This implementation of Marshaller marshalls lines as formatted by the HexChat IRC client.

      • getYear

        protected int getYear(java.time.Month messageMonth)
        Returns the year of the IRCMessage. This is guessing the year of the message. As the year is not logged by HexChat we expect it to be the current year unless we *just* had new years eve.
        Parameters:
        messageMonth - The month in which the message was sent.
        Returns:
        The year the message was most likely sent in.

      • parseDateTime

        protected java.time.LocalDateTime parseDateTime(java.lang.String dateTime)
        Parses the given String as a date time.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The String representation of the date time.
        Returns:
        the parsed LocalDateTime.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String could not be parsed.
